title: vanajAkSa ninne (tv)
sahitya:
vanajAkSa ninnE nammiti munijanAvana lOla 


anupallavi

  sanakAdi vandya janakasutA nAyaka
		(svara sAhitya)
shrI raghuvIra dayAkara sarasija lOcanalO kavirAjita sucarita


caraNam 1    sadaya nrpavara vibudha hita mrduLa suvacana dasharatha suta tilaka niratamu
    caraNam 2    I jagatilO phalanu nIvaNTi daivamu nEnendu gAnara krpAsamudra 
shrI vara shubhakara kavi sadAshivuni brOva rAma
